publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4177 Maureen Watt: Congratulations to Airyhall Primary on Fairtrade Status—That the Parliament congratulates Airyhall Primary School on its recent success in gaining Fairtrade status; notes that it is the first primary school in Aberdeen to gain such status, and recognises that the award follows years of hard work and commitment to highlighting and learning about fair trade.

S3M-4177 Congratulations to Airyhall Primary on Fairtrade Status (lodged on 19 May 2009) Rob Gibson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Brian Adam*, Sandra White*, Alasdair Allan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Angela Constance*, Patricia Ferguson*, Nigel Don*, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Robin Harper*, Bob Doris*

S3M-4177 Maureen Watt: Congratulations to Airyhall Primary on Fairtrade Status—That the Parliament congratulates Airyhall Primary School on its recent success in gaining Fairtrade status; notes that it is the first primary school in Aberdeen to gain such status, and recognises that the award follows years of hard work and commitment to highlighting and learning about fair trade. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Stewart Maxwell, Brian Adam, Sandra White, Alasdair Allan, Joe FitzPatrick, Angela Constance, Patricia Ferguson, Nigel Don, Stuart McMillan, Gil Paterson, Robin Harper, Bob Doris, Bill Kidd*, Ken Macintosh*, Aileen Campbell*, Alison McInnes*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-4177 Congratulations to Airyhall Primary on Fairtrade Status (lodged on 19 May 2009) Nanette Milne*
